tool_description: Retrieves current inventory levels across specified warehouse locations and products, providing real-time stock visibility.

warehouse_locations.description: List of warehouse location codes to check inventory levels

product_skus.description: Specific product SKUs to check; if empty, checks all products

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved/allocated inventory in totals

error_messages: Invalid warehouse location: One or more warehouse locations are not recognized in the system.
Product SKU not found: One or more specified SKUs do not exist in the inventory system.
Database connection failed: Unable to connect to inventory database. Retry after a few minutes.
usage: Provide warehouse_locations array and optionally filter by specific product_skus. Set include_reserved to true to include allocated inventory in counts.

total_locations_checked.description: Number of warehouse locations successfully checked

inventory_data.description: Array of inventory records in format 'Location|SKU|Available|Reserved|Total'

timestamp.description: When the inventory check was performed
